package_info.mp_subtitle: The module that serves your module's assets.
package_info.mp_description:
This module is meant to deliver all assets from the activated modules of the platform.
It will allow you to have a public folder in every ZF2 module to place your CSS, JS, images or anything that needs to be available.
Assets only need to be called with the following syntax: /ModuleName/folder/myasset
